plot: 30 Seconds to Fame is a fast-paced competitive talent show hosted by Craig J. Jackson. Each half-hour episode will pit approximately 24 acts of diverse talents in 2 rounds of competition. ...
plot_en: 30 Seconds to Fame is a fast-paced competitive talent show hosted by Craig J. Jackson. Each half-hour episode will pit approximately 24 acts of diverse talents in 2 rounds of competition. ...
plot_es: 30 Seconds to Fame is a fast-paced competitive talent show hosted by Craig J. Jackson. Each half-hour episode will pit approximately 24 acts of diverse talents in 2 rounds of competition. ...
title: 30 Seconds to Fame
